status_ailments_data.name: power break
status_ailments_data.description: Reduces the unit's Strength by 50%.

status_ailments_data.name: magic break
status_ailments_data.description: Reduces the unit's Magic by 50%.

status_ailments_data.name: armor break
status_ailments_data.description: Reduces the unit's Defense to 1 and nullifies 'armored'.

status_ailments_data.name: mental break
status_ailments_data.description: Reduces the unit's Magic Defense to 1.

status_ailments_data.name: berserk
status_ailments_data.description: Causes the unit to use 'attack' uncontrollably and boosts damage by 50%. Can be removed by 'Threaten'.

status_ailments_data.name: confusion
status_ailments_data.description: Causes the unit to use 'attack' uncontrollably, targeting themselves or their allies.

status_ailments_data.name: curse
status_ailments_data.description: Prevents the character's or aeon's overdrive from filling and overdrive commands can't be used.

status_ailments_data.name: darkness
status_ailments_data.description: Reduces the unit's chance of landing an evadable physical attack to 10% (before luck).

status_ailments_data.name: death
status_ailments_data.description: The unit's HP are reduced to 0.

status_ailments_data.name: delay
status_ailments_data.description: Adds to the unit's ticks to their next turn, delaying it.

status_ailments_data.name: doom
status_ailments_data.description: Gives the unit a turn counter and the unit is KO'd when it hits 0, ignoring immunity.

status_ailments_data.name: eject
status_ailments_data.description: Removes the unit from battle, making their slot irreplacable, and flagging them as 'dead'.

status_ailments_data.name: ko
status_ailments_data.description: The unit is unable to act and flagged as 'dead'. Inflicted by attacks that inflict instant KO, or if the unit's HP drop to 0, ingoring immunity.

status_ailments_data.name: petrification
status_ailments_data.description: The unit is unable to act and flagged as 'dead'. Petrified units can shatter, ejecting them from battle. Enemies always shatter instantly, as well as characters when they're underwater. Characters on land shatter when they're hit by physical attacks.

status_ailments_data.name: poison
status_ailments_data.description: Deals damage proportional to the unit's max HP every time they take a turn. The rate is 25% for characters and varies for enemies.

status_ailments_data.name: provoke
status_ailments_data.description: Forces the afflicted enemy to use one ability. If that ability is single-target, it will always target the provoking character. Removed instantly when the provoking character is switched out.

status_ailments_data.name: silence
status_ailments_data.description: The inflicted unit can not use magical abilities. Overdrives are not affected.

status_ailments_data.name: sleep
status_ailments_data.description: Forces the unit to skip their turns. Increases physical and magical damage against the unit by 50%. Removed instantly when the unit is hit by a physical attack.

status_ailments_data.name: slow
status_ailments_data.description: Doubles the unit's ticks until their next turn, causing the unit to take twice the normal amount of time to get turns. Overwrites Haste.

status_ailments_data.name: threaten
status_ailments_data.description: Causes the afflicted enemy to be frozen in time and thus unable to evade or act until the user's next turn. CTB altering actions like Haste, Slow, or Delay will fail on the user until their turn.

status_ailments_data.name: zombie
status_ailments_data.description: Restorative items and magic damage the unit. Grants immunity to instant death effects, as long as they don't ignore immunity. Items and magic that inflict Life will reduce the unit's HP to 0, if it is not immune to Life.

status_ailments_data.name: power distiller
status_ailments_data.description: Causes an enemy to drop Power Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

status_ailments_data.name: mana distiller
status_ailments_data.description: Causes an enemy to drop Mana Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

status_ailments_data.name: speed distiller
status_ailments_data.description: Causes an enemy to drop Speed Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

status_ailments_data.name: ability distiller
status_ailments_data.description: Causes an enemy to drop Ability Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

status_ailments_data.name: life
status_ailments_data.description: Revives a character that is flagged as 'dead'.

status_ailments_data.name: auto-life
status_ailments_data.description: Instantly revives a character that is KO'd with 25% of their max HP.

status_ailments_data.name: haste
status_ailments_data.description: Halves the unit's ticks until their next turn, causing the unit to take half the normal amount of time to get turns. Overwrites Slow.

status_ailments_data.name: HP critical
status_ailments_data.description: The character or Aeon alters their stance. Inflicted when their HP is below 50% (yellow). Activates SOS-Auto-Abilities.

status_ailments_data.name: nulblaze
status_ailments_data.description: Grants immunity to the next fire-elemental attack targeting the unit.

status_ailments_data.name: nulshock
status_ailments_data.description: Grants immunity to the next lightning-elemental attack targeting the unit.

status_ailments_data.name: nultide
status_ailments_data.description: Grants immunity to the next water-elemental attack targeting the unit.

status_ailments_data.name: nulfrost
status_ailments_data.description: Grants immunity to the next ice-elemental attack targeting the unit.

status_ailments_data.name: protect
status_ailments_data.description: Halves the unit's damage/healing taken from physical actions.

status_ailments_data.name: reflect
status_ailments_data.description: Bounces most single-target spells back towards the user.

status_ailments_data.name: regen
status_ailments_data.description: Restores a small amount of HP at the start of a turn from any unit in battle. The amount of HP restored is between 100 and a tenth of the unit's maximum HP.

status_ailments_data.name: shell
status_ailments_data.description: Halves the unit's damage/healing taken from magical actions.

status_ailments_data.name: sensor
status_ailments_data.description: Shows enemy's HP, elemental resistances, active statuses, and a brief description.

status_ailments_data.name: scan
status_ailments_data.description: Shows enemy's HP, elemental resistances, status immunities and a verbose description.

status_ailments_data.name: defend
status_ailments_data.description: Halves all physical damage taken by the user until their next turn.

status_ailments_data.name: guard
status_ailments_data.description: Causes the user to intercept all single-target physical attacks directed towards the party until the user's next turn.

status_ailments_data.name: sentinel
status_ailments_data.description: Halves all damage taken from physical attacks and causes the user to intercept all single-target physical attacks directed towards the party until the user's next turn.

status_ailments_data.name: shield
status_ailments_data.description: Causes the Aeon to take 75% less damage but gain no Overdrive gauge until its next turn.

status_ailments_data.name: boost
status_ailments_data.description: Causes the Aeon to take 50% more damage but charge its Overdrive gauge 50% faster until its next turn.
